name: FLERR
purpose: This function will return the error number for the last access for a particular file.

parts.description: The file_number of the file to be checked.

return_type: I The last file error number.
comments: If the last access was successful the FLERR() value returned will be 0. This function works for both TAS and non-TAS files. The error number returned will correspond to standard TAS Professional runtime errors. For more information please refer to Chapter 10, Runtime Errors.
